sentences.en: Do you have any suggestions for new land uses along the waterfront?
sentences.cn: 您对新海旁的土地用途有什麽建议 呢 ?

sentences.en: Do you know why Nordberg was at the waterfront?
sentences.cn: 你知道为什么诺德伯格昨天晚上去海边 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hundreds of people lined the waterfront to cheer the award - winning windjammer.
sentences.cn: 海旁有数以百计的市民列队欢迎,向这艘载誉归来船员热烈欢呼.

sentences.en: I have covered the waterfront on this subject in my report.
sentences.cn: 我在报告中详细谈了这问题.

sentences.en: It is the centrepiece of Doha's outstanding waterfront landmark, the West Bay business and residential complex.
sentences.cn: 这是多哈的具有里程碑意义的杰出海滨，西湾商业及住宅区的中心。

sentences.en: Many buildings on the waterfront have been spruced up.
sentences.cn: 滨水区有许多大楼都已修饰完毕.

sentences.en: Row upon row of newly built warehouses line the waterfront.
sentences.cn: 江岸新建的仓库鳞次栉比.

sentences.en: The Cullinan at West Kowloon waterfront with world - class design and prestige.
sentences.cn: 天玺耸立西九龙海旁, 世界级 设计尽显尊贵气派.

sentences.en: The Cullinan rising at West Kowloon waterfront with world - class design and prestige.
sentences.cn: 天玺矗立西九龙海畔, 世界级 设计尽显尊尚气派.

sentences.en: The ecologists say that is a very productive kind of waterfront.
sentences.cn: 生态学家们认为那儿是一块非常丰饶的滨水区.

sentences.en: The hotel is down on the waterfront.
The park on the waterfront is a good place for rest and recreation.
sentences.cn: 这个滨水公园是休息和娱乐的好地方.

sentences.en: The waterfront , once lined with factories, has been transformed into parks.
sentences.cn: 以前遍布工厂的海边, 现在该造成公园.

sentences.en: The waterfront restaurant serves good seafood.
sentences.cn: 这家滨水餐馆供应很好的海鲜.

sentences.en: They went for a stroll along the waterfront.
This report describes the open space recreational design vision for the waterfront park of the new economic and technical development zone (ETDZ).
sentences.cn: 本报告描绘了新经济技术开发区（ETDZ）开放的海滨公园是休闲景观规划设计构想蓝图。

sentences.en: Trees have been planted at intervals along the waterfront.
sentences.cn: 滨水地区已经栽满了树.

sentences.en: Why else would you come to a waterfront dive like this?
sentences.cn: 为什么你也会光临这种湖滨低级酒馆?

trans.tran_cn: 海滨，江边，装在火炉前部的热水缸
trans.tran_en: the part of a town or an area of land next to the sea, a river etc
